DOC.criteria: Part 1 : advanced stage solid tumor ; Part 2 : nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) , pancreatic cancer cutaneous melanoma Eastern cooperative oncology group ( ECOG ) performance score 0 1 Adequate organ function define protocol A woman childbearing potential must negative highly sensitive serum ( betahuman chorionic gonadotropin [ betahCG ] ) pregnancy test Screening negative urine pregnancy test prior first dose study drug During study least 120 day receive last dose study drug , addition highly effective method contraception , man sexually active woman childbearing potential must agree use barrier method contraception ( example [ eg . ] , condom spermicidal foam/gel/film/cream/suppository ) , sexually active woman pregnant must use condom Malignancy disease study within 2 year screen ( exception squamous basal cell carcinoma skin carcinoma situ cervix , malignancy opinion investigator , concurrence sponsor 's medical monitor , consider cure minimal risk recurrence ) Symptomatic brain metastasis ; asymptomatic brain metastasis allow provide treat , stable great ( > ) 6 week document radiographic imaging , require prolong ( > 14 day ) systemic corticosteroid therapy Treatment local systemic antineoplastic therapy investigational anticancer agent within 14 day 4 halflives , whichever longer , maximum washout period 28 day prior initiation study drug administration Toxicities previous anticancer therapy resolve baseline level Grade 1 less except alopecia peripheral neuropathy Major surgery ( eg. , require general anesthesia ) within 3 week screen , fully recover surgery , surgery plan time subject expect participate study
